attributes.action: Save the refugees from war not dehumanise them and let them die
attributes.background: This government and the rest of Europe is demonising refugees from war torn countries and refusing to allow them to seek asylum. We should treat them as fellow human beings and offer them sanctuary

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105991

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
